Hence, in another preferable embodiment of the invention, the dissociation constant K<sub>d </sub>of the antibody in regard to the respective epitope and/or in regard to the respective Opn protein is lower than 50 nM, preferably lower than 20 nM, more preferably lower than 10 nM, even more preferably lower than 5 nM, most preferably lower than 2 nM. 
Moreover, in another preferable embodiment of the invention, the off-rate value of the antibody in regard to the respective epitope and/or in regard to the respective Opn protein is lower than 5×10<sup>−3</sup>s<sup>−1</sup>, preferably lower than 3×10<sup>−3</sup>s<sup>−1</sup>, more preferably lower than 1×10<sup>−3</sup>s<sup>−1</sup>, even more preferably lower than 1×10<sup>−4</sup>s<sup>−1</sup>.

There are no sentences that meet the specified criteria, as none of the sentences contain a specific molecule name, a bioactivity metric, a numeric value, and a unit. The text appears to be focused on describing experimental methods and results, but does not provide specific quantitative data that meets the required criteria.

Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


The peptides were dissolved in a DMSO solution and further diluted in HBS buffer (0.01M Hepes, 0.1M NaCl, 0.004M EDTA, 0.05% P20, pH=7.4). 
For labeling, 1.5 μM CMFDA cell tracker (Molecular Probes, Cat# C7025) were added to the HEK293 cells (30 min, 37° C., 500 rpm). 
The chips in each flow cell were saturated with 1 μM D-Biotin. 
The flow rate of the antibodies was 30 μl/min at a concentration of 2 μg/ml, volume injected 100 μl. 
50 mg of frozen AT homogenized in 210 μl of lysing-buffer 210 μl of lysing-buffer containing 20 mM Tris, 140 mM NaCl, 1% Triton-X, complete-protease inhibitor cocktail (Roche) and sodium-orthovanadate (1 mM) adjusted to pH 7.4.

Here are the extracted sentences/rows that meet the criteria:

Monoclonal Ab 4-4-2 exhibited an affinity against ThrOpn of 13.9 nM and an off-rate value (describes the stability of the antibody-target-complex once formed) of 2,79 E-3 sec<sup>−1</sup>.
Monoclonal Abs 7-5-4 and 9-3-1 exhibit almost identical off-rate and KD values. In both cases the KD value is in the lowest nM or even high pM range, representing high affinity.
An excellent off-rate value is exhibited by mAb 21-5-4. This antibody also displays the highest affinity against the target region.
4-4-2	ThrOpn	2.79E−3	13.9
7-5-4	MmpOpn	8.89E−5	1.12E−9
9-3-1	MmpOpn	8.79E−5	0.97E−9
21-5-4	ThrOpn and MmpOpn	1.00E−5	0.84E−9

The antibody of any one of embodiments 1 to 7, wherein the dissociation constant K<sub>d </sub>in regard to the respective epitope and/or the respective Opn protein is lower than 50 nM, preferably lower than 20 nM, more preferably lower than 10 nM, even more preferably lower than 5 nM, most preferably lower than 2 nM.
